Notebooks evaluation

Global evaluation

DUACS

  • SSH evaluation with independant nadir: ssh_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb

  • (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: uv_scores_DUACS_geos.ipynb

MIOST

  • SSH evaluation with independant nadir: ssh_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb

  • (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: uv_scores_MIOST_geos.ipynb

MIOST w/ EW

  • SSH evaluation with independant nadir: ssh_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb

  • (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: uv_scores_MIOST_geos_barotrop_eqwaves.ipynb

Gulf Stream evaluation

DUACS

  • SSH evaluation with independant nadir: ssh_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb

  • (U,V) evaluation with independant drifters: uv_scores_DUACS_geos_GS.ipynb
